titles.title: Lamb of God! our souls adore Thee

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Son of God! Thy Father's bosom Ever was Thy dwelling-place; His delight, in Him rejoicing, One with Him in power and grace: O what wondrous love and mercy! Thou didst lay Thy glory by, And for us didst come from heaven As the Lamb of God to die.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lamb of God! When we behold Thee Lowly in the manger laid, Wandering as a homeless stranger In the world Thy hands had made; When we see Thee in the garden, In Thine agony of blood, At Thy grace we are confounded, Holy, spotless, Lamb of God!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we see Thee, as the victim, Bound to the accursed tree, For our guilt and folly stricken, All our judgment borne by Thee, Lord, we own, with hearts adoring, Thou hast loved us unto blood; Glory, glory everlasting Be to Thee, Thou Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lamb of God! Thou now art seated High upon Thy Father's throne, All Thy gracious work completed, All Thy mighty victory won. Every knee in heaven is bending To the Lamb for sinners slain; Every voice and heart is swelling, "Worthy is the Lamb to reign."{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
